short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to edit URL params and save some commonly used ones as favorites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension that allows you to edit URL parameters and save them as favorites with the click of a button!

Note: Do not use this extension to store any sensitive or personally identifiable information. The extension stores favorite parameters and related metadata in plain text. Use it at your own risk!
